ROI Dashboard | 5 Year Projection $0

Select a section below to review your ROI

To calculate your return on investment, begin with the first section below. The information entered therein will automatically populate corresponding fields in the other sections. You will be able to move from section to section to add and/or adjust values to best reflect your organization and process. To return to this screen, click the ROI Dashboard button to the left.

Claim Payments$0
Sparta Science has a proven track record of reducing insurance claims related to musculoskeletal health.

We finally have a way to functionally validate our rehab throughout our patient populations with objective measures for the workforce that we treat. This information is priceless when determining if they're ready to return to work!

- Chad Arcenaux, Owner and ATC, UnLock Training (training 10,000+)

We can look at different parameters in Sparta and see the profiles that place a person in risk. We have the ability then to put in place a program to appropriately minimize that risk.

- Dr. Brian Sennett MD Head Physician and Orthopedic Surgeon, University of Pennsylvania

children.html: Section Total:$0
Assessment Time Savings

How much time does it take to assess your workforce's current MSK health? How often are you assessing? Sparta Science provides an objective diagnostic tool that can assess an employee's MSK health in 90 seconds. This can be done on a monthly or quarterly basis to stay current, and the workers are provided with a corrective plan to improve their results on their own time

We finally have a way to functionally validate our rehab throughout our patient populations with objective measures for the workforce that we treat. This information is priceless when determining if they're ready to return to work!

- Chad Arcenaux, Owner and ATC, UnLock Training (training 10,000+)

We can look at different parameters in Sparta and see the profiles that place a person in risk. We have the ability then to put in place a program to appropriately minimize that risk.

- Dr. Brian Sennett MD Head Physician and Orthopedic Surgeon, University of Pennsylvania

children.html: What benefits would your organization realize if we could save your employees hours which equate to weeks of time?
Section Total:$0
Availibility / Productivity

The best ability is availability. When your employees are healthy and feeling great, they get more done in less time. Additionally, there is no need to pay overtime to workers that are already overexerted covering for someone else that is out because of an injury.

We finally have a way to functionally validate our rehab throughout our patient populations with objective measures for the workforce that we treat. This information is priceless when determining if they're ready to return to work!

- Chad Arcenaux, Owner and ATC, UnLock Training (training 10,000+)

We can look at different parameters in Sparta and see the profiles that place a person in risk. We have the ability then to put in place a program to appropriately minimize that risk.

- Dr. Brian Sennett MD Head Physician and Orthopedic Surgeon, University of Pennsylvania

Savings Summary$0

The table below represents a summary of the possible ROI you can expect by category and by year based on data supplied. You can adjust the ROI output to reflect implementation based on expected timelines.Note your calculated % return and projected payback period above.

Return on Investment is calculated by dividing the total net profit by the total cost. Payback Period calculates the time in months it takes your savings to equal that of your cost, including the implementation period.
